text: I shall give you hunger, and pain, and sleepless nights. Also beauty, and satisfactions known to few, and glimpses of the heavenly life. None of these you shall have continually, and of their coming and going you shall not be foretold.
author: Howard Lindsay

text: People don't associate red hair, pale skin, and freckles with beauty.
author: Shirley Manson

text: I still believe that capitalism is too harsh and I believe that, even within that, there is a lot of satisfaction and beauty if you happen to be one of the lucky ones, although that doesn't eradicate the reality of the suffering. It's all true at once, kind of humming and sublime.
author: George Saunders

text: Physical beauty is such a strange thing.
author: Jock Sturges

text: I was kind of a jock in school. Beauty wasn't something I spent a lot of time on.
author: Nina Dobrev
